# ackack_monitors (Data Source)

Use this data source to list all monitors.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "ackack_monitors" "all" {}

output "total_monitors" {
  value = length(data.ackack_monitors.all.monitors)
}

output "enabled_monitors" {
  value = [
    for m in data.ackack_monitors.all.monitors : m.name
    if m.is_enabled
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `monitors` (Attributes List) List of monitors. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--monitors))

<a id="nestedatt--monitors"></a>
### Nested Schema for `monitors`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) The timestamp when the monitor was created.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the monitor.
- `is_enabled` (Boolean) Whether the monitor is enabled.
- `last_checked` (String) The timestamp of the last check.
- `name` (String) The name of the monitor.
- `status` (String) The current status of the monitor.
- `type` (String) The type of monitor.
- `uptime_percentage` (Number) The uptime percentage of the monitor.
